message:
Join FREE Webinar Agile Testing in the Cloud

An informative session to breathe a new change to your testing processes while we cover interesting facts and provide access to info regarding: 
  -  Understanding 'Cloud Testing' vs. 'Testing in the Cloud'
  -  How SAAS, PAAS and IAAS impacts testing
  -  A Checklist for things to consider before moving to cloud
  -  A live demo of TestingWhiz, a test automation tool for cloud apps

Register Now
28 May, 9 AM - 10 AM GMT  http://bit.ly/10z5PHc
28 May, 10 AM - 11 AM Pacific Time http://bit.ly/11pCBMD
